title: Love Emergency
overview: An unemployed college dropout named Vinny, who lives in his mother and stepfather's basement, is applying for a janitorial position at the local hospital after meeting a lovely nurse . His life is turned upside down when his idiotic friend hacks the computer and he is mistakenly hired as a trauma surgeon in the emergency room . Love, sex, and weird chaos arise during his quest to stay busy so he can win the girls' affection.
